item.title: The past and the future of video games
item.author: pmassicotte@hotmail.com (Philippe Massicotte)
item.description: Download the data library("httr") library("readxl") GET("https://query.data.world/s/zoavyienlugc2te4clord3zalpkmcv", write_disk(tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx"))) video_game_revenus <- read_excel(tf) %>% janitor::clean_names() video_game_revenus #> # A tibble: 30 x 4 #> year platform percent_of_revenue est_revenue #> <dbl> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 2012 Mobile Games 0.18 12708000000 #> 2 2013 Mobile Games 0.23 17595000000 #> 3 2014 Mobile Games 0.290 24592000000 #> 4 2015 Mobile Games 0.34 31654000000. #> 5 2016 Mobile Games 0.4 42600000000 #> 6 2017 Mobile Games 0.
